== Main Inclusion Report for sourcepackage ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/s/scim-chewing, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Even though there are input methods for Traditional Chinese such as gcin and xcin, it's better to have scim-chewing for scim which will be a default input method for CJK users.
** See also MainInclusionReportscim
 0. ''Security:''
** No security histroy.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** scim-chewing is well maintained as a sub project of scim-im.org and chewing.csie.net.
** chewing is also ported to many other OS, like MacOSX, MS-Windows, and to IIIMF and JMCCE.
** No critial bugs found in ubuntu and debian.
** Other distros like SuSE  Mandriva have shipit as default chinese IMengine for scim.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** The package meets debian-policy and FHS.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in universe.
** scim MainInclusionReportscim
** libchewing2 - MainInclusionReportLibChewing2
